question: How do I reset my password?
answer: To reset your password: 1) Go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'. 2) Enter your registered email address. 3) Check your email for a password reset link (check spam folder if needed). 4) Click the link and create a new password. 5) Your password must be at least 8 characters with one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character. If you don't receive the email within 10 minutes, contact our support team.

question: How do I update my profile information?
answer: To update your profile: 1) Log into your account. 2) Click on your profile icon in the top right corner. 3) Select 'Account Settings'. 4) Navigate to 'Personal Information'. 5) Update your name, email, phone number, or address. 6) Click 'Save Changes'. Changes will be reflected immediately across all our services.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept multiple payment methods including: Credit Cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), Debit Cards, PayPal, Bank Transfers (ACH), and Digital Wallets (Apple Pay, Google Pay). For enterprise customers, we also offer invoicing with NET 30 payment terms. All transactions are secured with 256-bit SSL encryption.

question: How do I download my invoice?
answer: To download invoices: 1) Log into your account. 2) Navigate to 'Billing' section. 3) Click on 'Invoice History'. 4) Select the invoice you need. 5) Click the 'Download PDF' button. Invoices are generated automatically after each payment and are also sent to your registered email. You can download invoices for up to 7 years of transaction history.

question: What is your refund policy?
answer: Our refund policy: 1) Full refund available within 30 days of purchase for annual plans. 2) Pro-rated refunds for monthly subscriptions if canceled within 14 days. 3) No refunds for services already consumed or used beyond the trial period. 4) Refund requests must be submitted through the 'Billing' section or by contacting support. 5) Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days to the original payment method.

question: The application is running slow. What should I do?
answer: If you're experiencing slow performance: 1) Clear your browser cache and cookies. 2) Try using a different browser (we recommend Chrome or Firefox). 3) Check your internet connection speed (minimum 5 Mbps recommended). 4) Disable browser extensions temporarily. 5) Log out and log back in. 6) Check our status page at status.ourcompany.com for any ongoing issues. If the problem persists, contact support with your browser version and screenshot of the issue.

question: I'm getting an error message. How do I fix it?
answer: For error messages: 1) Take a screenshot of the exact error message. 2) Note what action you were performing when the error occurred. 3) Try refreshing the page (F5 or Cmd+R). 4) Clear browser cache and try again. 5) If error persists, click 'Report Issue' button on the error page. 6) Our system will automatically capture error logs and create a support ticket. Most common errors are resolved by clearing cache or updating your browser to the latest version.

question: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
answer: To enable 2FA: 1) Go to Account Settings > Security. 2) Click 'Enable Two-Factor Authentication'. 3) Choose your preferred method (SMS, Authenticator App, or Email). 4) For Authenticator App: Scan the QR code with Google Authenticator or Authy. 5) Enter the 6-digit code to verify. 6) Save your backup codes in a secure location. 7) 2FA will be required for all future logins. We strongly recommend using an authenticator app for maximum security.

question: How do I upgrade my plan?
answer: To upgrade your subscription: 1) Go to 'Billing' > 'Subscription Plans'. 2) Review available plans and features. 3) Click 'Upgrade' on your desired plan. 4) Confirm the pricing and billing cycle. 5) Enter payment information if required. 6) Click 'Confirm Upgrade'. Your new features will be activated immediately. You'll be charged the pro-rated difference for the current billing period. Upgrades take effect instantly with no service interruption.

question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime: 1) No cancellation fees or penalties. 2) Go to 'Billing' > 'Manage Subscription'. 3) Click 'Cancel Subscription'. 4) Select your reason for canceling (optional). 5) Confirm cancellation. Your service will remain active until the end of your current billing period. You'll retain access to all features until then. After cancellation, your data is retained for 90 days if you wish to reactivate.

question: What's included in the free trial?
answer: Our 14-day free trial includes: 1) Full access to all Premium features. 2) No credit card required to start. 3) Unlimited users (up to 10 team members). 4) 5GB cloud storage. 5) Email support. 6) Access to all integrations. 7) No automatic charge after trial ends. You'll receive reminder emails at 7 days and 1 day before trial expiration. If you don't upgrade, your account converts to our Free plan automatically.

question: How is my data secured?
answer: We implement enterprise-grade security: 1) 256-bit AES encryption for data at rest. 2) TLS 1.3 encryption for data in transit. 3) SOC 2 Type II certified data centers. 4) Regular third-party security audits. 5) GDPR and CCPA compliant. 6) Automated daily backups. 7) Multi-factor authentication. 8) Role-based access controls. 9) DDoS protection. 10) 24/7 security monitoring. Your data is stored in geographically distributed servers with 99.9% uptime guarantee.

question: Can I export my data?
answer: Yes, you can export all your data: 1) Go to 'Settings' > 'Data Management'. 2) Click 'Export Data'. 3) Choose export format (CSV, JSON, or Excel). 4) Select data range and types. 5) Click 'Generate Export'. 6) You'll receive an email when export is ready (usually within 1 hour). 7) Download link is valid for 7 days. You can export your data anytime, and there's no limit on the number of exports. All exports are encrypted and password-protected.

question: What third-party integrations do you support?
answer: We support 100+ integrations including: Productivity: Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Workspace, Zoom. CRM: Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive. Project Management: Asana, Trello, Jira, Monday.com. Accounting: QuickBooks, Xero, FreshBooks. Marketing: Mailchimp, ActiveCampaign. Development: GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket. Storage: Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive. We also offer REST API and Webhooks for custom integrations. Visit our Integrations Marketplace for the complete list.

question: How do I connect my Slack workspace?
answer: To connect Slack: 1) Go to 'Integrations' in your dashboard. 2) Find and click on 'Slack'. 3) Click 'Add to Slack' button. 4) Select your Slack workspace. 5) Review permissions and click 'Allow'. 6) Choose which channels to connect. 7) Configure notification settings. 8) Click 'Save Integration'. You'll start receiving notifications in Slack immediately. You can customize notification triggers, channels, and message formats in the integration settings.

question: How do I invite team members?
answer: To invite team members: 1) Go to 'Team' section in settings. 2) Click 'Invite Members'. 3) Enter email addresses (separate multiple emails with commas). 4) Assign roles (Admin, Editor, or Viewer). 5) Add custom welcome message (optional). 6) Click 'Send Invitations'. Team members will receive email invitations with setup instructions. Invitations expire after 7 days. You can manage team members, change roles, and remove access anytime from the Team dashboard.

question: What are the different user roles?
answer: We offer 4 user roles: 1) OWNER: Full access, billing management, can delete account. 2) ADMIN: All features, manage team, cannot access billing. 3) EDITOR: Create, edit, delete content, no team management. 4) VIEWER: Read-only access, can comment, cannot edit. You can customize permissions further with custom roles (Enterprise plan only). Role changes take effect immediately. Only Owners and Admins can change user roles.

question: Is there a mobile app available?
answer: Yes, we have mobile apps for iOS and Android: iOS: Download from App Store (iOS 13.0 or later required). Android: Download from Google Play (Android 8.0 or later). Features: Full functionality matching web version, offline mode, push notifications, biometric login, dark mode. The mobile app syncs in real-time with your web account. All data is encrypted end-to-end. Mobile apps are free to download for all subscription tiers.

question: I forgot my email address associated with the account.
answer: If you forgot your registered email: 1) Try common email addresses you use. 2) Check your email inbox for previous communications from us. 3) If you have access to your account via mobile app, check Settings > Account > Email. 4) Contact support with alternative verification: Your full name, phone number, and last transaction details. 5) Our team will verify your identity and help recover your account. For security reasons, we cannot disclose account information without proper verification.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: Multiple ways to reach us: 1) Email: support@ourcompany.com (Response within 24 hours). 2) Live Chat: Available Mon-Fri, 9 AM - 6 PM EST (click chat icon in bottom right). 3) Phone: +1-800-123-4567 (Premium and Enterprise customers only). 4) Support Portal: Submit ticket at help.ourcompany.com. 5) Community Forum: forum.ourcompany.com for peer help. Priority support available for Premium and Enterprise plans with guaranteed 2-hour response time.
